channel.title: [317] title screen problem background help plz![317]
channel.description:
Source: Delta
I don't know why my client does this but it say I want to put a new picture in as the client background it always flips it it's really wierd the default picture this client came with was this: [img]http://i797.photobucket.com/albums/yy257/xxDANxx1/title-1.png[/img]
and that doesn't flip when I load the client up. I really want to put a new picture as the background but it always flips please help me :(
